version_description:
Apple Watch features:
1. Lock - You can set a duration and lock iSafe by Apple Watch. iSafe app cannot be unlock until the locking time expired.
2. Force Quit - If you app is opened by others, you can terminate the app by Apple Watch.
3. Spy Shutter - The iSafe app will take a photo by using the front camera.
4. Find my Device - The iSafe app will play a bit sound 5 times, so as to find your device by using Apple Watch.
5. Music control - Play, Pause, Rewind and Forward action can be taken by using Apple Watch.
6. Notification - Display the notification, for example finished download.
7. Glance - Show the downloading counter and the title of playing music.




iOS 7 please don't update!!
I am terribly sorry that the iOS 7 cannot run the new version of iSafe as well.
It is because a line of code mistake. It will be fixed in the next update. It may take around 3 to 7 days depends on Apple review.
Your files and contents are still there. Please DON'T delete the app and install again in App Store. Otherwise, all your contents will be gone.

Bug fixed for the immediately crash in iOS 6 and iOS 7 when starting the app.

Apple Watch features:
1. Lock - You can set a duration and lock iSafe by Apple Watch. iSafe app cannot be unlock until the locking time expired.
2. Spy Shutter - The iSafe app will take a photo by using the front camera.
3. Music control - Play, Pause, Rewind and Forward action can be taken by using Apple Watch.
4. Notification - Display the notification, for example finished download.
5. Glance - Show the downloading counter and the title of playing music.
Fixed the crash after entered password in iOS 6

1. New design to import photos and video from camera roll
2. added back auto play slideshow
3. bug fixes
4. Download feature is removed.
5. youtube, vimeo and soundcloud are not supported by the private browser, you will redirect to Safari
6. Your files will not be backup by iCloud. Please use iTunes for backup instead.
Critical Bug fixes: Crash when entered a wrong password
Crash bug fixes

1. Reset App Password by iSafe account:
- Register a iSafe account by email
- When failed to login with 3 attempts, reset password page will be shown
- Login iSafe account to reset the app password.

2. Push Notification Added

Disable iSafe account service for Mainland China:
iSafe account service is base on Firebase which is blocked by Great Firewall of China, we disable the service for users in Mainland China.
Those users can access Firebase will not be affected.
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Minor Bug fixes..
Fixed some bugs cause crash.

New feature:
Edit and sync videos with iSafeTV app in your Apple TV. (Menu -> iSafeTV)
Fixed the bug leads crash when playing stored videos.

New feature:
360 Player - play with 360 video and panorama now!

Added tap control in VR player: In the fullscreen mode of the VR player,
- head up and touch to change the video type;
- head down and touch to pause / play;
- head left and touch to rewind 30 seconds;
- head right and touch to foward 30 seconds.
Added tips page in VR Player;
New interface!
New user interface in Album and Video section.

1 .New User Interface for Album and Video Category.
2. QR Code Reader added

Crash bug fixed when launching the QR Reader.
add support to iPad
Support for iPhone X

1. Minor update for iPhone X
2. The Lucky draw and rewarded system is removed,
Fixed the crash when creating account or login by using facebook.

1. Unlimited number of files can be selected and saved from in-app Album or Movie clip to Camera Roll, before is 5 in maximum.
-> press the navigation button in top right corner inside album/Movie clip -> select Organize -> select your files -> press export icon in the bottom right -> Save
2. minor bug fixes.
Fixed the bug caused infinite loading when importing Live Photo.

Fixed the crash in using FaceID unlock due to missing the usage description.
Minor updates for iPhone XS/XR.
The previous google Drive API is deprecated and out of work, so as to manage your files in google drive, please update.
The previous Dropbox API is deprecated and out of work, so as to manage your files in Dropbox, please update.

Completed features in Cloud tab:
You can now rename, delete and download file by pressing the right most arrow button in the file row (iCloud Drive, Google Drive, Dropbox)
Performance update.
Minor bug fixes

1. Removed Function: in-app secret Contacts
2. Performance update

1. fixed some bugs (www)
2. update the "Contact Us" email in Settings page. For bug report, please provide screenshots or screen recording video, so as to help us to locate the issue.
bug fixes
performance update
Fixes some crashing bugs due to updating UI in a wrong thread.
fix crashing bugs, more stable now.
crashing bug fixes, performance update
minor bug fixes for iOS12

Fixed the crashing bug caused by database library update.
Minor adjust for iOS 12.
minor bugs fixed for layout in the iPhone 12
fixed some crashing bugs.
minor bug fixes
Minor bugs fixes
